document.full_text: the ivorian military attacked the 'invisible commando' militia in abidjan on wednesday, the head of the militia and other sources said, signaling a violent break between the formerly allied forces.
document.title: ivorian army attacks "invisible commando" militia
lines_and_colors: the ivorian military attacked the 'invisible commando' militia in abidjan on wednesday, the head of the militia and other sources said, signaling a violent break between the formerly allied forces.
